name: Symphony
body:
## Symphony Data Acquisition System

Symphony is a data acquisition system focused on electrophysiology experiments. Symphony allows research scientists to write user-configurable acquisition routines in MATLAB. It also provides an interface to run those routines as part of an overall experiment.

## Install

There are two main components of Symphony: the core framework and the MATLAB interface. At the moment these components need to be installed separately.

#### Core Framework:

Download the [latest nightly build](https://build.physionconsulting.com/job/symphony-core/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/src/symphony-core/SymphonyWixInstaller/bin/x86/Release/Symphony.msi) of the core framework and run the installer.

#### MATLAB Interface:

Clone the Symphony GitHub repository via Terminal or Git Bash:

  git clone https://github.com/Symphony-DAS/Symphony.git

## Documentation

Documentation is available on the [project wiki](https://github.com/Symphony-DAS/Symphony/wiki).

## Community

We have a [Google Group](https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups=#!forum/symphony-das) for user and developer support and discussion.
